text: Ej ʙani Isroil, ʙa jod ored on vaqtro, ki ahdu pajmoni saxt giriftem, ki ƣajri Allohro naparasted va ʙa padaru modaru xeşovandon va jatimonu darveşon nekī kuned va ʙa mardumon suxani nek gued va namoz ʙixoned va zakot ʙidihed! Sipas rūj gardonided va sarpecī karded, magar şumori andake az şumo
